funding.tscmg.title: Traffic flow evaluation in Moenchengladbach
funding.tscmg.desc: The enviroCar platform was successfully used in traffic flow evaluation along major traffic roads in the city of Moenchengladbach. Approximately 150 citizens actively collected data using enviroCar. 52°North supported Traffic System Consulting GmbH by assuring quality of services and data and preparing the data for analysis.

touSecTitle3suba: a) Recording driving data with the help of the smartphone app
Aufz5: The enviroCar smartphone app allows you to record your driving data and publish it as open data. When recording your driving data, the martphone collects and stores the following data:
Aufz5.2: GPS position, GPS speed, GPS direction, quality metrics (HDOP, PDOP, VDOP)

touPara28: There is no reference to your account in the driving data that you publish as open data, thus  other users have no information about this relationship. Please note, it may be possible to draw conclusions about the author without this information. The data itself may contain such individual characteristics that a relationship to specific persons is obvious. For example, this is the case when a rare type of vehicle moves between a person’s living and working locations and this person is known to have this type of vehicle.To complicate such conclusions, there is an option to adjust the data recording so that it starts and ends with a minimum distance or duration from the start or destination of your journey.
touPara29: You can delete your enviroCar account at any time. touPara30: After deleting your account, we will no longer be able to assign the driving data to you and to manage it accordingly.
